00038 class Dataspace;
00039 
00069 class L4_EXPORT Rm :
00070   public L4::Kobject_t<Rm, L4::Kobject, L4Re::Protocol::Rm>
00071 {
00072   L4_KOBJECT(Rm)
00073 
00074 public:
00076   enum Detach_result
00077   {
00078     Detached_ds  = 0,      
00079     Kept_ds      = 1,      
00080     Split_ds     = 2,      
00081     Detach_result_mask = 3,
00082 
00083     Detach_again = 4,      
00084   };
00085 
00087   enum Region_flags
00088   {
00089     Read_only          = 0x01, 
00090 
00091     Detach_free        = 0x02,
00092     Pager              = 0x04, 
00093     Reserved           = 0x08, 
00094 
00095     Region_flags       = 0x0f, 
00096   };
00097 
00099   enum Attach_flags
00100   {
00101     Search_addr        = 0x20, 
00102     In_area            = 0x40, 
00103     Eager_map          = 0x80, 
00104 
00105     Attach_flags       = 0xf0, 
00106   };
00107 
00109   enum Detach_flags
00110   {
00120     Detach_exact   = 1,
00130     Detach_overlap = 2,
00131 
00139     Detach_keep = 4,
00140   };
00141 
00142 
00143   template< typename T >
00144   class Auto_region
00145   {
00146   private:
00147     T _addr;
00148     mutable L4::Cap<Rm> _rm;
00149 
00150   public:
00151     Auto_region() throw()
00152     : _addr(0), _rm(L4::Cap<Rm>::Invalid) {}
00153 
00154     explicit Auto_region(T addr) throw()
00155     : _addr(addr), _rm(L4::Cap<Rm>::Invalid) {}
00156 
00157     Auto_region(T addr, L4::Cap<Rm> const &rm) throw()
00158     : _addr(addr), _rm(rm) {}
00159 
00160     Auto_region(Auto_region const &o) throw() : _addr(o.get()), _rm(o._rm)
00161     { o.release(); }
00162 
00163     Auto_region &operator = (Auto_region const &o) throw()
00164     {
00165       if (&o != this)
00166         {
00167     if (_rm.is_valid())
00168       _rm->detach(l4_addr_t(_addr), 0);
00169     _rm = o._rm;
00170     _addr = o.release();
00171         }
00172       return *this;
00173     }
00174 
00175     ~Auto_region() throw()
00176     {
00177       if (_rm.is_valid())
00178   _rm->detach(l4_addr_t(_addr), 0);
00179     }
00180 
00181     T get() const throw() { return _addr; }
00182     T release() const throw() { _rm = L4::Cap<Rm>::Invalid; return _addr; }
00183     void reset(T addr, L4::Cap<Rm> const &rm) throw()
00184     {
00185       if (_rm.is_valid())
00186   _rm->detach(l4_addr_t(_addr), 0);
00187 
00188       _rm = rm;
00189       _addr = addr;
00190     }
00191 
00193     T operator * () const throw() { return _addr; }
00194 
00196     T operator -> () const throw() { return _addr; }
00197 
00198   };
00199 
00222   long reserve_area(l4_addr_t *start, unsigned long size,
00223                     unsigned flags = 0,
00224                     unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw();
00225 
00240   template< typename T >
00241   long reserve_area(T **start, unsigned long size,
00242                     unsigned flags = 0,
00243                     unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw()
00244   { return reserve_area((l4_addr_t*)start, size, flags, align); }
00245 
00258   long free_area(l4_addr_t addr) const throw();
00259 
00291   long attach(l4_addr_t *start, unsigned long size, unsigned long flags,
00292               L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, l4_addr_t offs = 0,
00293               unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw();
00294 
00300   template< typename T >
00301   long attach(T **start, unsigned long size, unsigned long flags,
00302               L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, l4_addr_t offs = 0,
00303               unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw()
00304   {
00305     union X { l4_addr_t a; T* t; };
00306     X *x = reinterpret_cast<X*>(start);
00307     return attach(&x->a, size, flags, mem, offs, align);
00308   }
00309 
00310   template< typename T >
00311   long attach(Auto_region<T> *start, unsigned long size, unsigned long flags,
00312               L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, l4_addr_t offs = 0,
00313               unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw()
00314   {
00315     l4_addr_t addr = (l4_addr_t)start->get();
00316 
00317     long res = attach(&addr, size, flags, mem, offs, align);
00318     if (res < 0)
00319       return res;
00320 
00321     start->reset((T)addr, L4::Cap<Rm>(cap()));
00322     return res;
00323   }
00324 
00341   int detach(l4_addr_t addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00342              L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task = This_task) const throw();
00343 
00360   int detach(void *addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00361              L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task = This_task) const throw();
00362 
00381   int detach(l4_addr_t start, unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00382              L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw();
00383 
00425   int find(l4_addr_t *addr, unsigned long *size, l4_addr_t *offset,
00426            unsigned *flags, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *m) throw();
00427 
00428   struct Region
00429   {
00430     l4_addr_t start;
00431     l4_addr_t end;
00432     l4_addr_t offset;
00433     L4::Cap<Dataspace> ds;
00434   };
00435 
00436   struct Area
00437   {
00438     l4_addr_t start;
00439     l4_addr_t end;
00440   };
00441 
00442   int get_regions(l4_addr_t start, Region **regions) throw();
00443   int get_areas(l4_addr_t start, Area **areas) throw();
00444 
00445   int detach(l4_addr_t start, unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00446              L4::Cap<L4::Task> task, unsigned flags) const throw();
00447 };
00448 
00449 
00450 inline int
00451 Rm::detach(l4_addr_t addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00452            L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw()
00453 {  return detach(addr, 1, mem, task, Detach_overlap); }
00454 
00455 inline int
00456 Rm::detach(void *addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00457            L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw()
00458 {  return detach((l4_addr_t)addr, 1, mem, task, Detach_overlap); }
00459 
00460 inline int
00461 Rm::detach(l4_addr_t addr, unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00462            L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw()
00463 {  return detach(addr, size, mem, task, Detach_exact); }
00464 
00465 };
